de.tud.kom.p2psim.api.common
Interface ComponentEventListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConnectivityListener, EmailClient, EmailServer, HostProperties, NetMessageListener, TransMessageListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOverlayNode, BTPeerDistributeNode, BTPeerSearchNode, BTTrackerNode, ClientNode, DefaultHostProperties, DefaultTransLayer, DistributionStrategyImpl, EmailClientImpl, ServerNode
public interface ComponentEventListener

Tagging (=marker) interface for listeners which receive component events. See subinterfaces of it for more details

Version:
3.0, 03.12.2007
Author:
Konstantin Pussep, Sebastian Kaune
